string.text: Closed Pass: Talk to the outpost commander
Borland is with the Duty. Find out what happened to them and what they need.
Approach Borland and have a chat with him.
Closed Pass: Find the entrance to the diggers' hideout
You need to explore the designated area around the hill and find the entrance-container. Look for information about the missing digger and antidotes there.
Find information about the missing digger and antidotes for yourself and Borland in the cache.
You need to return to Borland and give him the antidote.
You need to return to Borland within the specified time frame and bring him the antidote.
The Duty commander has something important to tell you. Follow him.
